meanings.definition: A person who rents or owns a small farm or piece of land, typically for subsistence farming.
meanings.sent1: The crofters in the village grow their own vegetables.
meanings.sent2: Many crofters raise chickens and goats on their land.
meanings.sent3: The crofters had a friendly competition to see who could grow the biggest pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: The community of crofters was like a big family, always helping each other out.
meanings.sent5: The image of the crofters working the land under the sun was picturesque.
